response.overview: Idealistic Nicole and her obedient husband, Ron, run a Female Friendly Farm: a progressive dairy farm where only women work on sustainable dairy products, from cheese and yogurt to cosmetics. Everything is 100% natural, environmentally friendly, and free of methane emissions. As Nicole proudly shares her vision for increased employment opportunities for women and innovation in farming, it slowly becomes clear that her drive to push boundaries goes further than expected. She's conducting a highly innovative experiment; after all, with enough encouragement, Nicole believes a great deal is possible.
response.title: Mannenmelk
